item.title: Metal Road Sign "Oakley Road" has been pulled down, 23rd August
item.description:
Location: Corner of Oakley Road onto Bromley Common for L/H turn the metal sign "Oakley Road" near wooden bench has been pulled down and is lying on grass area near the bench. Can this be up righted and secured please? If you stand in front of bench the sign is on the R/H side of bench. Thank You.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakley Road, Keston Mark, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: People/ person urinating nightly in corner of Horselydown Mansions and Jubilee Yard on Lafone Street, 23rd August
item.description:
Nightly (and sometimes during the day) people urinate in the street on the corner of Horselydown Mansions and Jubilee Yard entrance on Lafone Street. When hot it gets smelly - as is today. Please can the corner be jet washed and thought given as to how to deter people / person from doing this?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Lafone Street, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet
